mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Walsh, Jonathan
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Walsh, Jonathan Patient Age: 32. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Fracture of nasal bones from a blow from the butt of a carbine by a rebel. Physical debility: loss of sight of left eye and weakness of right eye. . Location Wounded: New Creek [West Virginia]. Date Wounded: 1864/11/28. Nature of Wound: Blow from carbine . Result: Discharged from service.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Walsh, Jonathan
Fracture of nasal bones from a blow from the butt of a carbine by a rebel. Physical debility: loss of sight of left eye and weakness of right eye.
Corporal
